extracted_playbook.title: Update Parasolid to Latest Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Siemens has released new versions for the affected products. Update Parasolid V36.1 to V36.1.225 or later, V37.0 to V37.0.173 or later, and V37.1 to V37.1.109 or later.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted PAR Files
extracted_playbook.description: Reduce risk by not opening untrusted PAR files in Parasolid.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms as a general security measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IT Environment According to Siemens Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Operate devices in a protected IT environment by configuring according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and following product manual recommendations.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Defensive Measures Against Social Engineering
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as encouraged by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
